trans-unit.note: After this text, the program will display the path to the conversion file (the location of the file on this computer). The conversion file specificies a mapping which is used to convert the script for one language into the script for another.
This text is shown if an error occurred while running eSpeak. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).

After this text, the program will display the language code of the language settings that eSpeak used. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).
After this text, the program will display the text of the current text box after being converted into the script of another language using the settings in the conversion file.

trans-unit.source: Bloom needs to verify your email, but our attempt to resend the request failed, possibly because you made too many requests too close together. Please check your email, and if you can't find the message, try again later.
trans-unit.target: Bloom inahitaji kuthibitisha barua pepe yako, lakini jaribio letu la kutuma ombi tena halikufaulu, labda kwa sababu ulifanya maombi mengi kwa karibu sana. Tafadhali angalia barua pepe yako, na ikiwa huwezi kupata ujumbe, jaribu tena baadaye.

trans-unit.source: Funded by the local community only
trans-unit.target: Imefadhiliwa tu na jamii ya mtaa

trans-unit.source: The code should look like SOMENAME-123456-7890
trans-unit.target: Msimbo huu unastahili kuonekana kama JINAFULANI-123456-7890

trans-unit.source: Bloom Enterprise adds features and services that are important for publishers, governments, and international organizations. This paid subscription meets their unique needs while supporting the development and user support of Bloom for the community at large.
trans-unit.target: Bloom Enterprise inaongeza vipengele na huduma ambazo ni muhimu kwa wachapishaji, serikali, na mashirika ya kimataifa. Usajili huu uliolipwa unakidhi mahitaji yao ya kipekee wakati unasaidia maendeleo na msaada wa watumiaji wa Bloom kwa jamii kwa ujumla.

trans-unit.source: None. Enterprise features will be unavailable.

In an older version of Bloom, this project used **%0**. To continue to use this you will need to enter a current subscription code. Codes for SIL brandings can be found [here](%1). For other subscriptions, contact your project administrator.
trans-unit.note: %0 will be replaced with the name of the branding. Keep surrounding **...**. [here](%1) will become a hot link; %1 will not be seen, but will be the URL for the destination page. Translate "here" and keep the [](%1) around it.
trans-unit.target: Katika toleo la zamani la Bloom, mradi huu ulitumia **%0**. Ili kuendelea kutumia hii utahitaji kuingiza nambari ya usajili ya sasa. Misimbo ya chapa ya SIL inaweza kupatikana [here]] (%1). Kwa usajili mwingine, wasiliana na msimamizi wako wa mradi.

trans-unit.source: That code appears to be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Msimbo huo unaonekana kuwa si sahihi.

trans-unit.source: This version of Bloom does not have the artwork that goes with that subscription.
trans-unit.target: Toleo hili la Bloom halina mchoro unaoambatana na usajili huo.

trans-unit.note: A link offering more information about the Funded Local Community Only option
